data.persona: My life is art. I don't want my life to be a pale imitation of art. I want it to be art.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
Many beautiful types of flowers and plants grow here.  There's a small shed used for store gardening equipment.
There's a flower, a plant, an eisel, a bulb, a painting., a shed, a watering can, a seed, and a gardening equipment here.
The hummingbird and the grass snake are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a paint marked smock.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the grass snake
data.mid_motivation: I want to paint the snake and the garden scene
data.long_motivation: I want to sell my painting of the snake and garden so I can afford to travel to distant lands

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put grass snake in tree branch
